attributes.action: STOP all Pensions due to M.P.'s who have been caught up in the Telegraph Revelations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P.'s who have been caught with their fingers in the till are being allowed to Stand-Down or be De-selected. This allows them to receive full Pension rights and "Parachute Payments" when they cease attending Parliament. These people should either be forced to resign or be dismissed immediately and all pension and parachute payment rights withdrawn without any appeals what-so-ever being permissible.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
